panels.description: Maximum loss percentage across ALL sessions. Any value > 0 indicates a problem.

targets.query: SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "loss" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Max Loss %

targets.query: SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.avg-delay") AS "delay" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.avg-jitter") AS "jitter" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Number of active TWAMP sessions being monitored

targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WITH KEY = "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" WHERE "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/

panels.title: Active Sessions

panels.description: Current status of all TWAMP sessions. Sorted by Loss % descending - problems appear at top.

targets.query: SELECT last("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / last("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "Loss %", last("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.avg-delay") AS "Delay", last("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.avg-jitter") AS "Jitter" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 5m AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

panels.title: Network Health - Current Status

targets.query: SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "Current" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 5m AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

panels.description: Maximum loss percentage in last 1 hour

targets.query: SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "1h Max" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 1h AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

panels.title: Loss Analysis - 1h Maximum

panels.description: Maximum loss percentage in last 6 hours

targets.query: SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "6h Max" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 6h AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

panels.title: Loss Analysis - 6h Maximum

panels.description: Maximum loss percentage in last 24 hours

targets.query: SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "24h Max" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

panels.title: Loss Analysis - 24h Maximum

panels.description: Combined loss analysis showing Current, 1h, 6h, and 24h maximum values per session

targets.query: SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "Current" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 5m AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "1h Max" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 1h AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "6h Max" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 6h AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

SELECT max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / max("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "24h Max" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id"

panels.title: Loss Analysis - Combined

panels.description: Historical loss percentage over time for all sessions

targets.query: SELECT mean("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.loss-count") / mean("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.send-count") * 100 AS "loss_pct" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" fill(null)

panels.title: Loss % Timeline

panels.description: Round-trip delay over time for all sessions

targets.query: SELECT mean("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.avg-delay") AS "delay" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" fill(null)

panels.title: Delay Timeline

panels.description: Jitter over time for all sessions

targets.query: SELECT mean("content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.statistics.avg-jitter") AS "jitter" FROM "huawei-twamp-controller:twamp-controller/client/sessions/session/huawei-twamp-statistics:statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" =~ /^${session:regex}$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "content.twamp-controller.client.sessions.session.0.id" fill(null)

panels.title: Jitter Timeline
